opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgments of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Merle Africa, I. P. P., Charles Africa, I. P. P., Jeanine Africa, I. P. P., Rhonda Africa, I. P. P., Frank Africa, I. P. P., Life Africa, I. P. P., Jane Doe Africa, I. P. P., pro se.

437 A.2d 931
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v.
